launcher.title: Calculate interest rates
launcher.description: Calculate in areas like economy, interest rates, etc.

charzam_calculate_interest.YOU_CAN_CALCULATE_THE_MONTHLY_INTEREST_R: You can calculate the monthly interest rate on your savings from the yearly interest rate.
charzam_calculate_interest.YOU_CAN_USE_THE_RESULT_IN_YOUR_BUDGET_TO: You can use the result in your budget to add bank interest on your savings each month.
charzam_calculate_interest.THAT_SOLVES_THE_PROBLEM_WITH_INTEREST_RA: That solves the problem with interest rate on interest rate.
charzam_calculate_interest.IF_YOU_CALCULATE_MONTHLY_LOAN_INTEREST_R: If you calculate monthly loan interest rates then do not use this tool.
charzam_calculate_interest.FOR_LOANS_YOU_DIVIDE_THE_YEARLY_INTEREST: For loans you divide the yearly interest rate by 12.
charzam_calculate_interest.DIFFERENCE_IS_THAT_LOANS_DO_NOT_HAVE_INT: Difference is that loans do not have interest rate on interest rate.
charzam_calculate_interest.CALCULATE_MONTHLY_INTEREST_RATE_ON_YOUR_: Calculate monthly interest rate on your savings
charzam_calculate_interest.MONTHLY_INTEREST_RATE_PERCENT_WITH_TWO_D: Monthly interest rate percent with two decimals
charzam_calculate_interest.MONTHLY_INTEREST_RATE_DECIMAL_WITH_ALL_D: Monthly interest rate decimal with all decimals for your bugdet
